content.en: Underwater image enhancement: Researchers have been exploring various algorithms to enhance underwater images. These algorithms, such as dehazing, color correction, fusion, and contrast enhancement, are used to improve the quality of underwater images by correcting colors, enhancing contrast, and reducing haze. By combining these algorithms, scientists aim to achieve better visibility and clarity in underwater photography.
content.da: Undervandsbilledeforbedring: Forskere har undersøgt forskellige algoritmer for at forbedre undervandsbilleder. Disse algoritmer, såsom tågefjernelse, farvekorrektion, fusion og kontrastforbedring, bruges til at forbedre kvaliteten af undervandsbilleder ved at korrigere farver, forbedre kontrast og reducere tåge. Ved at kombinere disse algoritmer sigter videnskabsfolk mod at opnå bedre synlighed og klarhed i undervandsfotografering.
